div.p: CARMINA GRATULATORIA Strasbourg, A. Bertram, 1584. FRIDERICO DOCANDROLandauiensi, HONESTO CVM PRIMIS ET ERVDITO IV- VENI, HONORES ET INSIGNIA MA¬ GISTERII, IN ACADEMIA REI- pub. Argentinensis laudatissi¬ ma, quinto die Nouemb. accipienti, à Decano specta¬ bili, D. Laurentio Tuppio, V. I. Doctore, Anno à saluatore nato 1584. GRATVLANTVR AMICI.( Vignette). ARGENTORATIExcudebat Antonius Bertramus.( Verso blanc.) In-40, car, ital, et grecs, 8 ff. non ch., sign. A- B, réclames, ini¬ tiales ornées; titre encadré,( ornaments.) Poésies de M.Leonhard Hutterus, Petrus Friderus Mindensis, Josephus Langius Caesarimontanus Michaël Beutherus, Ioannes StennglArgen¬ tinâs, Hieronymus Treutlerus Suidnicensis Für¬ Steurle Landauiensis Crusius Leorinus WallungSilesius, Christophorus Leysserus gang Olsnicensis, Ioannes Stenngl, Ioachimus Silesius, Nicolaus Landensis, Paulus Molendinus Schmelzing Treutlerus . R102288(8). Prov.: Bibliothèque Ch. Schmidt, Strasbourg. 455 299 CARMINA GRATULATORIA Strasbourg, A. Bertram, 1585. Carmina Gratulatoria, Scripta ab amicis, IN HONO¬ REM] MELCHISEDECI PONTANI AVSTRII;] CVM EI SECVNDVS PHILOSOPHIAE GRADVS,) in inclyta ArgentoratensiumAca¬ demia, à M.HEN- NINGOOLDENDORPIO: Decano spectabili decerneretur V. Cal. Nouemb. Anno salutis humanae 1585. Marque typ. d’ Ant..( H C B, Planche XLIV, NO I, Silvestre, No 1023.) ARGENTORATI. Excudebat Antonius Bertramus. CIO. ID. LXXXV.( Verso blanc.) In-4e, car. ital., 6 ff. non ch, sign. A- B, réclames, initiales ornées.
